attributes.review: This app is horrible. 😤 I was on the toilet and all of a sudden a huge snake came through my window and almost ate my leg! 😨Also, another occasion was I was in bed playing the game and my bed exploded and rats flew everywhere! 🎃That is not acceptable.👹 Over all, I give this app a one star review because it stole my dinosaur nuggets and farted on my lawn mower. 🧚‍♀️❤️💩💨
attributes.title: Not worth it ☹️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support Donald Trump but as soon as I downloaded it my husband left me for another woman, my oldest child got arrested and I lost my job all in the span of 5 minutes from downloading this app. I am now homeless and my son is still in jail because I have no money to bail him out and it is all thanks to this app.
attributes.title: This app is Cursed

attributes.review: It makes a glitch in your phone and it makes your phone stop working also they can stalk you through your phone and they are planning to take down tiktok so let’s take down this app for being a horrible app and making people’s phone stop working
attributes.title: Worst app ever😡😡

attributes.review: i downloaded the app and all i saw was a human Cheeto! i was absolutely disgusting. the pure gut tearing graphics on this app are too much to handle. i’ve gone to therapy several times after downloading this app. this app is the biggest regret of my life. i also lost a severe amount of brain cells. it has ruined my life.
attributes.title: absolutely terrible

attributes.review: I got this app and lemme tell you worst mistake I suddenly got this urge to eat everything and anything and now thanks to this app I ate everything in my house from food to clothes to electronics and even my walls and doors and even my family I am now going to jail I wish someone would have warned me sooner :(
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: I never have issues with my phone but within an hour of downloading my phone kept glitching and turning off randomly! I tried many things to fix it but the problem fixed itself after I deleted this app.
attributes.title: Ruined my Phone!

attributes.review: This app will are my food, which is fricking rude like I was feeding my pet tree then my mom said that my tree would like a piece wood to eat and I went to look for wood and it was gone and I checked the app and it said the wood was being processed and my granny snapped Bc that was our last piece of wood and my granny had a heart attack 😻
attributes.title: This app will eat your food

attributes.review: this app is the worst. it literally called me a loser and then proceeded to slap me across the face with a piece of salami. the audacity is insane. also, my giraffe tried to eat it but it gave him a stomach virus. i blame this app. terrible. horrible. unbelievably bad. tik tok is way better and idk that’s all. DO NOT download this app just to leave a 1 star review...
attributes.title: terrible, awful, horrible, a disgrace to the nation...

I really don’t recommend getting this intact if your getting this YOUR A KAREN AND GO TELL EVERYONE THAT YOUR A KAREN TO AND DONT FORGET IT. attributes.review: Absolutely terrible this app crashes constantly. I even got a virus on my other device!! And not to mention the constant over load of notifications if you don’t have them off. It also tracks your location? Something off about this app. 1/10 do not recommend...
